instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
instructions.2: Arrange the chicken breasts in a large casserole dish. Drizzle butter, honey, and vegetable oil over the breasts, and evenly sprinkle garlic powder and onion on top.
instructions.3: Bake uncovered for 1 hour in the preheated oven.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the oven from Step 1 being used?
Is oven from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is onion from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
Is chicken breasts live after Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the oven in Step 3?
Can we arrange (Step 2) and bake (Step 3) at the same time?
